title: Mobile Microlearning Course to Improve Pharmacy Staff Supervision Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic pharmacy operational processes
context.additional_context: Constructivist approach-based reflective practice and field experience learning emphasized in real workplace settings

learning_goals: Learners can apply basic supervisory skills related to pharmacy operations and personnel management in real-world contexts
Learners can understand and utilize document creation principles required in supervisory processes for practical applications
Learners demonstrate over 80% learning transfer effectiveness in post-evaluations conducted two months later
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
